data.name: Grand Class Melee 2 - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Grand Class Melee 2's original soundtrack features a symphonic suite of battle ready themes led by lush strings and backed with a chiptune-infused percussion section. Plus, it's free for all owners of GCM2 on Steam!

  • 1. Atlas Agon (Title Theme)
  • 2. Whiff of Pitch (Wood Theme)
  • 3. Scavenger Sun (Dune Theme)
  • 4. Shifting Winds (Interlude Theme)
  • 5. Imperfect Contrition (Mire Theme)
  • 6. Dire Brio (Ruin Theme)
  • 7. Absit Omen (End Theme)

Music by Trevor McAleese / Drixxel
